bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to George Palmer Putnam, 17 December 1868
bibl.orgName: The Bayley-Whitman Collection, Ohio Wesleyan University, Delaware, Ohio

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Would the enclosed piece be available to you for say the March number of your monthly?
The price is $45—and 30 copies of the number in which it may be printed.
I have had it put in type for my own convenience, & to insure greater correctness.
May I ask you the favor to send me your decision within a week?

postscript.p: I reserve the right of printing the piece in future book.
